title: Project A
description: This cybersecurity project offers hands-on learning, focusing on encryption, firewalls, and intrusion detection. Through personalized challenges, you'll refine your defense strategies and deepen your understanding of data protection.

title: Project B
description: This project involves building a clone of Myntra, an e-commerce platform, using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. It serves as a practical exercise to learn web development languages and replicate the functionality and design of a popular online shopping website.

title: Project C
description: Project C is a Netflix clone created using HTML, CSS, and a touch of JavaScript. It replicates the user interface of Netflix, allowing users to browse through a selection of content and view details of each item.

title: Project D
description: Project D is a video streaming platform created using React.js and JavaScript. Inspired by OTT platforms, it allows users to browse through a selection of content and watch videos. The platform features a user-friendly interface designed with CSS.
